items.sentence: Tom is liable to get shot if he's not careful.
We should've done that when we had the chance.
There weren't very many people at the lecture.
Have you two had a chance to talk things over?
People are still afraid to leave their houses.
What you said makes absolutely no sense to me.
I'll speak to Tom about that as soon as I can.
I didn't have time to finish what I was doing.
Shouldn't you turn your windshield wipers off?
You should've confessed everything right away.
Tom said that he doesn't want to learn French.
My mother told me that Tom is my half-brother.
Tom was found tied to a chair in the basement.
I've warned Tom several times not to go there.
I don't know when Tom started studying French.
I vowed that I would never speak to Tom again.
This bad weather is more than I bargained for.
I really hope Tom Jackson doesn't get elected.

I don't want to become a professional athlete.
